message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
